mapper.select: select sigle, book_id, label, codeisbn, author_id, editor_id, publicationdate, format_id, url, language_id, image_id from public.book where book_id = 1;
select sigle, book_id, label, codeisbn, author_id, editor_id, publicationdate, format_id, url, language_id, image_id from public.book order by label desc;
select sigle, book_id, label, codeisbn, author_id, editor_id, publicationdate, format_id, url, language_id, image_id from public.book where codeisbn = #{isbn};
select sigle, book_id, label, codeisbn, author_id, editor_id, publicationdate, format_id, url, language_id, image_id from public.book where book_id = #{idBook};
select sigle, book_id, label, codeisbn, author_id, editor_id, publicationdate, format_id, url, language_id, image_id from public.book where sigle = #{sigleBook};
select book_label, codeisbn, author_label, sigle, program_label, data from recherche_par_programme_view where program_label= #{program} order by program_label desc;
